title: Fact Signature
description: A Fact Signature document is an attachment to a Fact that allows a Fact to have multiple signatures.

certificate.description: The certificate from the issuing realm.

timestamp.description: The date and time of the issued fact signature.

expires.description: The date and time of when this fact signature expires.

subject.description: The subject the signature is issued for as a JWK

hash.description: The checksum of the fact that this fact signature covers.
